item.title: Litter bin full and flytipping near bin at Crawford street outside convenience store, 23rd June

item.title: Overflowing bin, 23rd June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchfields Road, Elmers End, London

item.title: Send someone to fix their back garden, 23rd June
item.description:
There are rats and mice because of this jungle garden. Send people to sort it out. The weed is going into the sky. it's been growing for 2 years now. Thanks.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Springfield, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead tree has been dumped on the street for almost one month. Also people doing balloons and leaving rubbish. Excess leaves need sweeping up too., 23rd June
item.description:
The dead tree has been there for over one month. The canister also. Please can you remove them. Location is outside the garden of the the grove nursery on macfarland grove opposite house number 2. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Macfarland Grove, Old Kent Road, London
